Text: Football is here ARE YOU READYWorld Sports Exchange Press Release September St Johns Antigua World Sports Exchange WSEXcom the largest and most respected sports book on the Internet is happy to World Sports Exchange has been licensed and regulated by the government of Antigua and Barbuda since Dont be fooled by other flybynight operations that claim to have licenses or claim to have been in business a long time We have a long track record as a dependable and reliable sports book WSEXcom is the real deal World Sports Exchange is the only major sports book in the world to offer online minute for an hour before kickoff This year we have the capacity to handle more than double that amount If you can use a mouse you can place a wager If you want betting options state of the art
